title: patch 7.24 fps issue
body:
since the winter map is back to summoners rift i experience some probs with fps. normally i have around 110 fps when i play but since the update with the winter map my game is giving me low performances but the game still says i run around 110 fps and i know this cant be true. i tried turning the winter map off but this didnt work, also i tried to put my video settings lower at the point of very low but still this problem persists. I also tried other games to look if its my pc thats dying but those still run fine. to give a good idea how the game runs its like the units dont move smooth and slender when they move.

i hope you can can do something about this, and otherwise thats just bad luck for me. {{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body: If you've already disabled the Snowdown assets through the in-match settings, this might actually be something more driver related rather than your pc just dying xP. Do me a favor and double check your graphics and directX drivers to make sure they are still fully updated. If that doesn't help let me know and we can dig a little deeper into this!
